name: Green Motion
overview:
Green Motion has developed the next generation of charging post infrastructure, which paves the way for many innovative and essential carbon reducing technologies. Green Motion charging stations have the unique distinction of being the only points to connect electric cars directly with â€˜greenâ€™ electricity, from wind and solar sources. The enabling technology, developed in the UK and unique to Green Motion charging stations gives electric car owners the ultimate green credentials. In the future the same technology will also facilitate vehicle to grid load balancing, which allows energy generators to rely more on renewable alternatives without risk of supply interruption.

The Green Motion system accommodates different plug formats, and charging rates. It integrates with new and existing RFID systems, has online management services and is equipped with maximum communication potential, offering a huge array of communication and information opportunities, such as battery diagnostic checks and online servicing.

GreenMotion is an independent electronic device integration, infrastructure and software development company. Its vision is to encourage the use of clean energy sources, by becoming Europeâ€™s leading developer and manufacturer of electric vehicle charging stations.

Green Motion (UK) Limited has exclusive partnership agreements with innovative electricity retailer Green Energy (UK) Plc and energy management software specialists Smart Grid Technologies Limited.
